fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.heater

Interface HeaterCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, HeaterImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HeaterConnector, HeaterInboundPort, HeaterOutboundPort

    public interface HeaterCI
extends HeaterImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI
    The component interface HeaterCI defines the signatures of services that can be called on the thermostated heater component.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2021-09-10

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      Contract pre isRunning() post return >= -50.0 && return <= 50.0
      boolean isRunning()
      return true if the heater is currently running.
      void setTargetTemperature(double target)
      set the target temperature for the thermostat controlling the heater.

      start the heater.
      void stopHeater()
